description: The proven standard in free-pivot 75mm bindings.<br><br>The Axl Telemark binding sports a bombproof 6-hole mounting pattern, long-lasting chrome die springs, and a front assembly built of tough stainless steel. It gives you adjustable, exceptional power, but tours effortlessly. Try it and you'll love it!
name: Axl - 75mm Binding

specs.value: 2000 lb test cable attachments won't break, toepiece forces transmitted steel-to-steel
1.1" or 28mm at the rear, with a 2 degree ramp
